switch_schedule.name: Switch Schedule
switch_schedule.description: Switch to a different heating schedule. The schedule applies to all rooms in the home.

schedule_name.name: Schedule Name
schedule_name.description: The name of the schedule to activate.

refresh_schedules.name: Refresh Schedules
refresh_schedules.description: Force a refresh of all schedule and home data from the Intuis API.

home_id.name: Home ID
home_id.description: Target a specific home (optional). If not provided, refreshes all configured homes.

set_schedule_slot.name: Set Schedule Slot
set_schedule_slot.description: Set a zone for a specific time range in the active heating schedule. Creates a slot from start_time to end_time with the specified zone.

day.name: Day of Week
day.description: Day of the week for the time slot (0=Monday, 6=Sunday).

start_time.name: Start Time
start_time.description: When the zone should start (HH:MM format, 24-hour).

end_time.name: End Time
end_time.description: When the zone should end and return to the previous zone (HH:MM format, 24-hour).

zone_name.name: Zone Name
zone_name.description: The name of the zone (e.g., Night, Day, Eco).

import_energy_history.name: Import Energy History
import_energy_history.description: Import historical energy data from Intuis cloud to existing sensor entities. Data appears on the same sensor.{room}_energy entities used in the Energy Dashboard.

days.name: Days to Import
days.description: Number of days of history to import (1-730). Default is 365 days.

room_name.name: Room
room_name.description: Import only this room. Leave empty for all rooms.

user.title: Connect Your Account
user.description: Enter your Netatmo/Intuis credentials to connect your heating system.

select_home.title: Select Home
select_home.description:
Your account has multiple homes. Select which one to configure.

You can add additional homes by setting up the integration again.

indefinite.title: Override Behavior
indefinite.description: Choose what happens when temperature overrides expire.

data_description.indefinite_mode:
**ON**: Temperature changes stay active until you change them again (auto-renewed before the 12-hour hardware limit).

**OFF**: Overrides expire after their set duration and return to schedule.

overrides.title: Temperature & Duration Settings
overrides.description:
Set preset temperatures and how long overrides last.

*Note: The 12-hour maximum for Manual and Boost is a hardware limit.*

data_description.away_temp: Temperature when Away mode is active (e.g., on vacation).
data_description.manual_duration: How long manual temperature changes last.
data_description.away_duration: How long Away mode stays active.
data_description.boost_duration: How long Boost mode stays active.

energy.title: Energy Monitoring
energy.description: Configure how energy usage is tracked.

data_description.energy_scale: How often to update energy consumption data.

reauth_confirm.title: Re-authenticate Intuis Account
reauth_confirm.description: Session expired for {username}. Please enter your password.

error.cannot_connect: Cannot connect to Intuis service. Please check your internet connection.
error.home_not_found: Selected home not found. Please try again.

abort.all_homes_configured: All homes from this account are already configured.
